alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Pawnee; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 5:23PM CDT until May 09 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Central Stafford County in south central Kansas... East central Edwards County in south central Kansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 522 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Radium, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Seward around 530 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Dillwyn and St. John. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
